data.message: Eminem looks better at 41 than he did in his early twenties.  Giving up drugs worked wonders.  :-)

replies.message: actually not eminem looked and better in twenties abd his songs were just better than awesone Shady Rules his songs were much better than it is now recovery relapse r the worst albums he made  Slim Shady Is The Best For Me ..............
